mean_cn: n. 在两地之间乘车往返；  vi. 经常乘车往返于两地之间；  vt. 减免
mean_en: the journey that you make when you travel to or from a place that you go to regularly (such as the place where you work)
word_etyma: com表加强 + mute改变 → commute 两地之间乘车往返
sentence: I commute from my home to the office by bus every day.
sentence_trans: 我每天乘公交车往返于家和办公室。
